a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-re-ṣu-u-a lu DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ 03 lim {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ GIR₃.2-MEŠ {LU₂}GAR-nu-te {LU₂}GAL-kal-lab-MEŠ {LU₂}GAL-kal-lab-MEŠ ša {1}se-e-ti-ni {LU₂}EN.NAM ša pu-tu-u-a a-na {URU}mu-ṣa-ṣir u₂-ta-me-šu {ID₂}MI {ID₂}MI e-tab-ru {ANŠE}a-ṣap-pu-šu₂ nam-ma-la nam-ma-la ša {1}se-e-ti-ni ina pa-ni-šu šu-u₂ ša {1}su-na-a {LU₂}EN.NAM ša pu-ut {KUR}u₂-ka-a.a {LU₂}ERIM-MEŠ-šu u₂-ta-mi-šu-ma a-na {URU}mu-ṣa-ṣir a-se-me ma-a LUGAL ina ŠA₃ {URU}u₂-e-si il-lak u₂-di-na la u₂-nam-maš
